app.controllers

Class CommandController

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.controllers.CommandController

  • public class CommandController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main controller. It is called by the Main to create the other controllers (ActionController, TaskController and UndoController) and initialise ModelManager. Skeleton based on jolly's CE2.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandController

        public CommandController()
        Constructor for CommandController. It will also initialise CommandParser, ModelManager, ActionController, taskController and UndoController. During initialisation of ModelManager, it will catch an IOException from ModelManager and do the necessary error catching depending on the type of the error. It will then pass the model manager during creation of ActionController and will set the main app for ActionController.

    • Method Detail

      • printString

        protected void printString(java.lang.String message)
        Method for printing message.
        Parameters:
        message -

      • determineCommandType

        protected CommandController.CommandType determineCommandType(java.lang.String commandWord)
        This method will take in the command word word and will return an enum of different command types.
        Parameters:
        commandWord -
        Returns:
        CommandType an enum of different command types

      • processCommand

        protected java.lang.String processCommand(CommandObject commandObject)
        This method will take in a CommandObject and get the CommandType from determineCommandType method. It will do a simple switch logic, determined by the command word type and call the correct method from ActionController. It will return a feedback string that will be displayed by the display later on.
        Parameters:
        commandObject -
        Returns:
        feedback

      • parseCommand

        public void parseCommand(java.lang.String inputString)
        This method will be called by the InputFieldViewManager to start parsing the input string typed by the user. It will also call the CommandParser method to change the input string into a CommandObject. It will then print the result for debugging purpose. The result is not shown in the user interface.
        Parameters:
        inputString -

      • parseKeywords

        public java.util.ArrayList<Keyword> parseKeywords(java.lang.String inputString)
        This method is called by the InputFieldViewManager to detect the keywords in the input string. The input string will be passed by the InputFieldViewManager and will be passed to CommandParser to get the keywords. It will return an ArrayList of Keyword.
        Parameters:
        inputString -
        Returns:
        ArrayList an ArrayList of Keyword

      • convertList

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<TodoItem> convertList(java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> todoList)
        This method is used to convert an ArrayList of TodoItem into an ObservableList of TodoItem. It uses javafx library to do the conversion.
        Parameters:
        todoList -
        Returns:
        ObservableList an ObservableList of TodoItem

      • updateView

        public void updateView()
        This method will update the view (user interface) with the list of current todo items to be shown to the user. This method will be called by the processCommand method to update the view after "updating" (CRUD, sort, search) the todo items.

      • updateView

        public void updateView(java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> todoItems)
        An overloading method for updateView. It will take in an ArrayList and view that ArrayList in the view.
        Parameters:
        todoItems - an ArrayList of TodoItem

      • getTaskList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<TodoItem> getTaskList()
        This method will get the ArrayList from the ModelManager.
        Returns:
        ArrayList

      • resetTaskList

        public void resetTaskList()
        This method will update the currentList with the undone TodoItem retrived from TaskController.

      • changeSettings

        public void changeSettings(java.lang.String filePath,
                           java.lang.Boolean randomColorsEnabled,
                           java.lang.Boolean notificationsEnabled)
        Calls the changeSettings method in modelManager. Mostly used by the SettingsView to change the user's settings from the settings window.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The new file directory to be used.
        randomColorsEnabled - The new random color display setting.
        notificationsEnabled - The new notification display setting.

        Returns:
        error
